title: As of March 2021, Pixel 4a is not available in India? When will it be back please?
content:
So far, have contacted Flipkart, who do not know when it'll be back.  Also, Tata Croma have not stocked it in ages, and do not plan to. Third party retailers in Amazon India are selling it far above the premium, and it's not sure if it is the genuine product.
Please guide as to when will Pixel 4a be available for purchase in India.
